Title(s): ‘Disputison bitwene a god man and þe deuel’
_description: ‘Disputison bitwene a god man and þe deuel’ — 987 lines in couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SWiþe muche neode hit isÞat vche mon be war and
                    wys…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And kep vs from þe synnes seueneAnd graunt vs alle
                    þe blisse of heuene
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
A disputison bi twene a god man and þe deuel (f.
                    288vc)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
…I am a ferrene mon and a wei feeryngSpeke with me feire
                    wiþouten grucchyng…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…And kepe vs from þe synnes seueneAnd graunt vs alle
                    þe blisse of heuene
BLAdd22283.Note: Missing lines 1-38 due to lost folios.
